articles.author: Christie D’Zurilla
articles.title: Corden protesters want more than 'Spill Your Guts' changes - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: Protesters still want an apology and donation after James Corden said he will remove Asian foods from 'Spill Your Guts' game accused of cultural insensitivity.
articles.content:
When is a controversy done being a controversy?
Thats the question now for thousands of online critics and late-night host James Corden. At issue is his occasional segment Spill Your Guts or Fill Yo… [+5341 chars]
